analysis.description:
Reentrancy in FinalizableCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/7/0x8d9a6eb79d4810bf06612db0a59ec517e9bbd287.sol#708-712):
	External calls:
	- finalization() (/unique_chucks/7/0x8d9a6eb79d4810bf06612db0a59ec517e9bbd287.sol#709)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/7/0x8d9a6eb79d4810bf06612db0a59ec517e9bbd287.sol#709-712)

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/7/0x8d9a6eb79d4810bf06612db0a59ec517e9bbd287.sol#579-581) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/7/0x8d9a6eb79d4810bf06612db0a59ec517e9bbd287.sol#580)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/7/0x8d9a6eb79d4810bf06612db0a59ec517e9bbd287.sol#665-668) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/7/0x8d9a6eb79d4810bf06612db0a59ec517e9bbd287.sol#666-668)
